options: Iherezo ry' umuhanda urombeje w'ibice byinshi
kugabanya umuvuduko no gusiga umwanya uhagije hagati y'ibinyabiziga  byombi
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?

options: Igisubizo cya mbere n'icya kabiri ni byo by'ukuri
question: Iyo itara ry'umuhondo rimyatsa rikoreshejwe mu masangano y'amayira ahwanyije  agaciro rishyirwa ahagana he:

options: Babona gusa ibumoso bwabo iby'ibara ritukura
Iburyo babona iby'ibara risa n'icunga rihishije gusa
question: Inkombe z'inzira nyabagendwa cyangwa z'umuhanda zishobora kugaragazwa  n'ibikoresho ngarurarumuri. Ibyo bikoresho bigomba gushyirwaho ku buryo abagenzi  babibona :

options: Wegereye icyapa cyo guhagarara umwanya muto
question: Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?
Iyo hatarimo indi myanya birabujijwe gutwara ku ntebe y'imbere y'imodoka abana  badafite imyaka ikurikira

options: Aho abana bagenewe kwiga gutwara amagare
Abanyamagare bagomba kuva ku igare bakagendesha amaguru
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?
Ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa ibinyabiziga bigenda bigomba kugira:

options: Ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga kometse ku ruhande rwayo
question: Ubugari bwa romoruki ntiburenza ubugari bw'ikinyabiziga kiyikurura iyo ikuruwe  n'ibinyabiziga bikurikira:
Uburyo bukoreshwa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigende gahoro igihe feri idakora neza  babwita:

options: Umuhanda ubona neza no kwitondera kunyuranaho
Ikinyabiziga kinturutse imbere gishaka gukatira I buumoso
question: Mbere yo kunyura ku kindi kinyabiziga, ni ngombwa kumenya ko:
Amatara ndanga burumbarare, agomba kubonwa nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye n'umuyobozi  w'ikinyabiziga kiri mu ntera ya
Ijambo”Remoroki ntoya ”bivuga remoroki iyo ariyo yose ifite uburemere:

options: Birabujijwe gutambuka umurongo wo guhagarara umwanya muto cg igihe uwo  murongo udahari icyo kimenyetso ubwacyo
A na b ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Mubimenyetso bimurika itara ry'umuhondo risobanura iki ?
Amagambo”ATTENTION CONVOI” yanditse ku cyapa cy'umuhondo mu nyuguti  zitukura zishyirwa ku kinyabiziga cya mbere mu biherekeranije mu butumwa agomba  gusomeka neza ku manywa muri:

Ku byerekeye kwerekana ibinyabiziga n'ukumurika kwabyo ndetse no kwerekana  ihindura ry'ibyerekezo byabyo. Birabujijwe gukora andi matara cyangwa  utugarurarumuri uretse ibitegetswe ariko ntibireba amatara akurikira:
Umurongo ucagaguye wera mu muhanda usobanura iki?

options: gutwara yegera umurongo wo hagati mu muhanda yerekeza ibumoso
gutwara yegera ku uruhande rw'ibumoso bw'umuhanda
Gutwarira hafi y'umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
question: Igihe umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga agendera munzira y'icyerekezo kimwe akifuza gukata  ibumoso yakora iki?
Iyo umuvuduko w'ibinyabiziga bidapakiye ushobora kurenga km50 mu isaha  ahategamye, bigomba kuba bifite ibikoresho by'ihoni byumvikanira mu ntera:

options: Ishusho y'uruziga ubuso bwera ikiranga ishusho y'inka mu ibara ry'umukara
Ishusho ya mpandeshatu ubuso bwera umuzenguruko utukura ikiranga ishusho  y'inka mu ibara ryera
Ishusho y'uruziga ubusa bw'ubururu ikiranga ishusho y'inka mu ibara ryera
Ishusho mpandeshatu ndinganire y'umutuku ubuso bw'ubururu inka mu  ishusho ry'ibara ryera
question: Icyapa kivuga inzira y'amatungo itegetswe kirangwa

options: Itegure kureka uwo mwana w'umuhungu atambuke kuko yajya mu muhanda  atitaye ku kinyabiziga cyawe
Gabanya umuvuduko ubwire uwo mwana yambuke ukoresheje ibimenyetso
Komeza nkaho uwo mwana akiri munzira y'abanyamaguru
question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yegereye aho umwana w'umuhungu utwaye akagare  k'abana asezera ku nshuti ye . N'iyihe myifatire myiza wagira imbere yabo?
